verses.verse: A Prayer of the afflicted, when he is overwhelmed, and poureth out his complaint before Jehovah. Hear<WH8085> my prayer<WH8605>, O Jehovah<WH3068>, And let my cry<WH7775> come unto thee<WH935>.

Hide <WH5641> not thy face<WH6440> from me in the day<WH3117> of my distress<WH6862>: Incline<WH5186> thine ear<WH241> unto me<WH3117>; In the day when I call<WH7121> answer<WH6030> me speedily<WH4118>.
For my days<WH3117> consume<WH3615> away like smoke<WH6227>, And my bones<WH6106> are burned<WH2787> as a firebrand<WH4168>.
My heart<WH3820> is smitten<WH5221> like grass<WH6212>, and withered<WH3001>; For I forget<WH7911> to eat<WH398> my bread<WH3899>.
By reason of the voice<WH6963> of my groaning<WH585> My bones<WH6106> cleave<WH1692> to my flesh<WH1320>.
I am like<WH1819> a pelican<WH6893> of the wilderness<WH4057>; I am become as an owl<WH3563> of the waste places<WH2723>.
I watch<WH8245>, and am become like a sparrow<WH6833> That is alone<WH909> upon the house-top<WH1406>.
Mine enemies<WH341> reproach<WH2778> me all the day<WH3117>; They that are mad<WH1984> against me do curse by me<WH7650>.
For I have eaten<WH398> ashes<WH665> like bread<WH3899>, And mingled<WH4537> my drink<WH8249> with weeping<WH1065>,
Because <WH6440> of thine indignation<WH2195> and thy wrath<WH7110>: For thou hast taken me up<WH5375>, and cast me away<WH7993>.
My days<WH3117> are like a shadow<WH6738> that declineth<WH5186>; And I am withered<WH3001> like grass<WH6212>.
But thou<WH3068>, O Jehovah, wilt abide<WH3427> for ever<WH5769>; And thy memorial<WH2143> name unto all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>.
Thou wilt arise<WH6965>, and have mercy<WH7355> upon Zion<WH6726>; For it is time<WH6256> to have pity<WH2603> upon her<WH4150>, Yea, the set time is come<WH935>.
For thy servants<WH5650> take pleasure<WH7521> in her stones<WH68>, And have pity<WH2603> upon her dust<WH6083>.
So the nations<WH1471> shall fear<WH3372> the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068>, And all the kings<WH4428> of the earth<WH776> thy glory<WH3519>.
For Jehovah<WH3068> hath built up<WH1129> Zion<WH6726>; He hath appeared<WH7200> in his glory<WH3519>.
He hath regarded<WH6437> the prayer<WH8605> of the destitute<WH6199>, And hath not despised<WH959> their prayer<WH8605>.
This shall be written<WH3789> for the generation<WH1755> to come<WH314>; And a people<WH5971> which shall be created<WH1254> shall praise<WH1984> Jehovah<WH3050>.
For he hath looked down<WH8259> from the height<WH4791> of his sanctuary<WH6944>; From heaven<WH8064> did Jehovah<WH3068> behold<WH5027> the earth<WH776>;
To hear<WH8085> the sighing<WH603> of the prisoner<WH615>; To loose<WH6605> those that are appointed<WH1121> to death<WH8546>;
That men may declare<WH5608> the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068> in Zion<WH6726>, And his praise<WH8416> in Jerusalem<WH3389>;
When the peoples<WH5971> are gathered<WH6908> together<WH3162>, And the kingdoms<WH4467>, to serve<WH5647> Jehovah<WH3068>.
He weakened<WH6031> my strength<WH3581> in the way<WH1870>; He shortened<WH7114> my days<WH3117>.
I said<WH559>, O my God<WH410>, take me not away<WH5927> in the midst<WH2677> of my days<WH3117>: Thy years<WH8141> are throughout all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>.
Of old<WH6440> didst thou lay the foundation<WH3245> of the earth<WH776>; And the heavens<WH8064> are the work<WH4639> of thy hands<WH3027>.

They shall perish<WH6>, but thou shalt endure<WH5975>; Yea<WH1086>, all of them shall wax old like a garment<WH899>; As a vesture<WH3830> shalt thou change<WH2498> them<WH2498>, and they shall be changed:
But thou art the same<WH8141>, And thy years shall have no end<WH8552>.
The children<WH1121> of thy servants<WH5650> shall continue<WH7931>, And their seed<WH2233> shall be established<WH3559> before thee<WH6440>.
